amendment.description: To require Federal reserve banks to transfer certain surplus funds to the general fund of the Treasury, to be used for the provision of Indian health care services.

action.text: Amendment SA 1025 proposed by Senator Dorgan.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 1025 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay. 47 - 51. Record Vote Number: 163.
Amendment SA 1025 ruled out of order by the chair.
